title: How to Change Chat Colors and Emoji in Facebook Messenger

steps.title: Open the Messenger app.
steps.content: Open the Messenger app. This looks like a lightning bolt with a multicolored speech bubble. If you aren't already logged in, enter your Facebook account information to do so now. To change the chat color in Facebook Messenger , you'll need to change the theme.

steps.title: Tap a chat.
steps.content: Tap a chat. You'll see your friends' chats listed from most recent to least. If you aren't already on the Chats tab, tap it to navigate there now.

steps.title: Tap the conversation name.
steps.content: Tap the conversation name. This is at the top.

steps.title: Tap Theme.
steps.content: Tap Theme . A new menu will open.

steps.title: Tap a theme.
steps.content: Tap a theme. You can tap a certain color or gradient from the selection.

steps.title: Tap Select.
steps.content: Tap Select . This will change your chat theme. If you want to change the theme back to the default color, select the Classic option. This is the Facebook-blue circle.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/messages/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/messages/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged into your Facebook account, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now. You can also use the Messenger desktop app . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click a conversation.
steps.content: Click a conversation. You'll see your open conversations in the left panel.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This is in the top-right corner, next to the chat name. This may also look like i .

steps.title: Click Customize Chat.
steps.content: Click Customize Chat . This is in the right panel. If you're using the Messenger desktop app, this will look like Theme .

steps.title: Click Change theme.
steps.content: Click Change theme . A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Select a new theme.
steps.content: Select a new theme. You can click a certain color or gradient from the selection.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This will change your chat theme. If you want to change the theme back to the default color, select the Classic option. This is the Facebook-blue circle.
